author: Kevin Liptak and Jim Acosta, CNN
description: Amid the croquet players and lunch guests mingling at Mar-a-Lago Friday, a more sober gathering was unfolding under the palms.
title: Trump to Bannon and Kushner: Work this out
Trump considers rearranging the seats at his table
description: The future of top White House staffers, Steve Bannon and Reince Priebus, is uncertain, as President Donald Trump is increasingly sending signals he is considering a major shakeup of his leading advisers.
author: Kevin Liptak, Jamie Gangel, Sara Murray and Jeff Zeleny, CNN

description: The photo, showing Trump and top advisors at national security briefing, parallels Situation Room photo from Obama era
author: Elissa Nunez, CNN
title: What this photo of Trump's war room tells us
